title: Chicken with Tomatoes and Olives
ingredients: ['2 skinless, boneless chicken breast fillets', '4 tablespoons olive oil', '6 cloves garlic, pressed', '2 tablespoons chopped fresh rosemary', '1/2 bottle dry white wine', '3 plum tomatoes, seeded and chopped', '75g (3 oz) black olives, pitted and halved']
